result.eng: Well, there is one in An Cnoc next to the church.
result.ga: bhuel tá ceann ar an gcnoc in aice leis an séipéal
result.orig: Bhuel tá ceann ar an gCnoc in aice leis an séipéal
result.html: bhuel tá ceann ar an gcnoc in aice leis an séipéalWell, there is one in An Cnoc next to the church.
result.ponchtml: ḃuel tá ceann ar an gcnoc in aice leis an séipéalWell, there is one in An Cnoc next to the church.

result.eng: Well, often I watch cartoons on the television.
result.ga: bhuel breathnaím ar chartúin ar an teilifís go minic
result.orig: Bhuel breathnaím ar chartúin ar an teilifís go minic
result.html: bhuel breathnaím ar chartúin ar an teilifís go minicWell, often I watch cartoons on the television.
result.ponchtml: ḃuel breaṫnaím ar ċartúin ar an teilifís go minicWell, often I watch cartoons on the television.

result.eng: Well, the television is the problem then, unless you are spending too much time in the shower!
result.ga: bhuel is í an teilifís an fhadhb mar sin mura bhfuil tú ag caitheamh an iomarca ama sa gcithfholcadh
result.orig: Bhuel is í an teilifís an fhadhb mar sin mura bhfuil tú ag caitheamh an iomarca ama sa gcithfholcadh
result.html: bhuel is í an teilifís an fhadhb mar sin mura bhfuil tú ag caitheamh an iomarca ama sa gcithfholcadhWell, the television is the problem then, unless you are spending too much time in the shower!
result.ponchtml: ḃuel is í an teilifís an ḟaḋb mar sin mura ḃfuil tú ag caiṫeaṁ an iomarca ama sa gciṫḟolcaḋWell, the television is the problem then, unless you are spending too much time in the shower!

result.eng: Well, I hope that you will feel better soon.
result.ga: bhuel tá súil agam go mbeidh biseach ort go luath
result.orig: Bhuel tá súil agam go mbeidh biseach ort go luath
result.html: bhuel tá súil agam go mbeidh biseach ort go luathWell, I hope that you will feel better soon.
result.ponchtml: ḃuel tá súil agam go mbeiḋ biseaċ ort go luaṫWell, I hope that you will feel better soon.

result.eng: Well, take the car there tomorrow.
result.ga: bhuel tabhair an carr seo ann amárach
result.orig: Bhuel tabhair an carr seo ann amárach
result.html: bhuel tabhair an carr seo ann amárachWell, take the car there tomorrow.
result.ponchtml: ḃuel taḃair an carr seo ann amáraċWell, take the car there tomorrow.

result.eng: Well, in the summer I go to football matches.
result.ga: bhuel sa samhradh téim chuig na cluichí peile
result.orig: Bhuel sa samhradh téim chuig na cluichí peile
result.html: bhuel sa samhradh téim chuig na cluichí peileWell, in the summer I go to football matches.
result.ponchtml: ḃuel sa saṁraḋ téim ċuig na cluiċí peileWell, in the summer I go to football matches.
